name: Kymera Keeper - Available soon on over 1 billion devices!
blurb: Kymera Keeper is a monster battle role playing game that lets you play with friends across Facebook, iOS, and Android!

rewards.reward: ----- "Curious Keeper" ----  \r\nYour contribution shows that there is interest in changing the status quo for social and mobile games! \r\nGet regular updates about Kymera Keeper's development! Receive a thank you email from the Development Team!
--- "Inquisitive Keeper" --- $20 worth of Red Coins to spend at launch!* A full digital soundtrack from the game! Receive a thank you email from the Development Team!

---- "Helpful Keeper" ----  $50 worth of Red Coins to spend at launch!*
Get the limited edition Kickstarter avatar costume! This will never be released again! 
Your name will be featured on Kymera Keeper's Heroes of Legend webpage! 
A full digital soundtrack from the game! 
Receive a thank you email from the Development Team!

---- "Kickstarter Keeper" ----    $150 worth of Red Coins to spend at launch!* Share your Red Coins with up to two friends. Be one of the first players to get Gunvol, the Fire Goat! This powerful Kymera will not be available to the general public until a future patch! Get the limited edition Kickstarter avatar costume! This will never be released again!  \r\nA full digital soundtrack from the game! Your name will be featured on Kymera Keeper's Heroes of Legend webpage!  Receive a thank you email from the Development Team!

--- "Journeyman Keeper" --- $300 dollars worth of Red Coins to spend at launch!*
Share your Red Coins with up to four friends. 
A Kymera Keeper t-shirt signed by the team featuring artwork from the game! 
Be one of the first players to get Gunvol, the Fire Goat! This powerful Kymera will not be available to the general public until a future patch! 
Get the limited edition Kickstarter avatar costume! This will never be released again! 
A full digital soundtrack from the game!
Your name will be featured on Kymera Keeper's Heroes of Legend webpage!  
Receive a thank you email from the Development Team!

---- "Master Keeper" ----  A whopping $1000 worth of Red Coins to spend at launch!*
Share your Red Coins with up to four friends.  
A Skype session with an executive of your choice to ask questions and let your opinion be heard. Choose from the CEO, Marketing, Art, Design, or Programming teams. 
A poster of your Kymera of choice drawn by the designing artist!
A Kymera Keeper t-shirt signed by the team featuring artwork from the game!  
Be one of the first players to get Gunvol, the Fire Goat! This powerful Kymera will not be available to the general public until a future patch! 
Get the limited edition Kickstarter avatar costume! This will never be released again!  
A full digital soundtrack from the game!
Your name will be featured on Kymera Keeper's Heroes of Legend webpage!  
Receive a thank you email from the Development Team!

---- "Legendary Keeper" ----  Unlimited Red Coins for you and a friend at launch! 
Work with our design team to create your own custom Kymera to be collectable by all players in the game!
A poster of your Kymera of choice drawn by the designing artist! 
A Kymera Keeper t-shirt signed by the team featuring artwork from the game!  
A Skype session with an executive of your choice to ask questions and let your opinion be heard. Choose from the CEO, Marketing, Art, Design, or Programming teams.  
Be one of the first players to get Gunvol, the Fire Goat! This powerful Kymera will not be available to the general public until a future patch! 
A full digital soundtrack from the game!
Get the limited edition Kickstarter avatar costume! This will never be released again!  
Your name will be featured on Kymera Keeper's Heroes of Legend webpage!  
Receive a thank you email from the Development Team!

--- "Advertising Keeper" ---  A special kickstarter for companies and studios who want to get their name out on a social environment!  Our marketing team will work with you to place a rotated ad on the game's website for a full month.  Two positions are shared each month from April 2012 to April 2013.  Check the main Kickstarter description to see details.  Contact us with any questions you might have!

---- "The Seraphim" ---- Because there are Angels out there!  Includes all rewards from Legendary Keeper pledge level.
Be credited as an Executive Producer for Kymera Keeper!
Be flown out to Santa Clara, CA for two days to meet the development team and receive our thanks in person. Includes a hotel stay and transportation for you and a guest.
Be serenaded with a song made personally for you by one of our talented team members.
